meanings.definition: A game played by two people, each taking turns to mark a square on a grid with either an X or an O.
meanings.sent1: Let's play ticktacktoe on this paper grid.
meanings.sent2: During recess, the kids enjoyed a friendly game of ticktacktoe.
meanings.sent3: The cat watched curiously as the family played ticktacktoe on the living room floor.
meanings.sent4: In the world of ticktacktoe, every move counts like a strategic dance.
meanings.sent5: The simplicity of ticktacktoe makes it a timeless classic for all ages.

meanings.definition: To play the game of ticktacktoe.
meanings.sent1: We can ticktacktoe after finishing our homework.
meanings.sent2: She ticktacktoed with her brother after dinner.
meanings.sent3: The siblings ticktacktoed to decide who would do the dishes.
meanings.sent4: His mind ticktacktoed between choosing X or O for his next move.
meanings.sent5: Ticktacktoeing is a fun way to pass the time with friends.
